p.k: TEROS is a documentary film that tells the story of Los Teros, the team that defends Uruguay national team, which is the only amateur team competed in the Rugby World Cup 2015 held in England. This group of athletes trains day after day while facing their daily professional duties. Professionals from different careers, students and workers make up a group that trains as professionals in spite of being amateurs. Based on effort, they qualified for the Rugby World Cup 2015, and played against the best.
